# A Modal Editor

# Targets

```{r}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
tar_script()
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
tar_make()
```

```{r}
tar_visnetwork(callr_arguments = list(show = FALSE))
```

```{r}
tar_load(penguins)
```

```{r}
DT::datatable(penguins)
```

```{r}
clean_penguins <- tar_read(clean_penguins)
```

```{r}
clean_penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_cm, bill_depth_cm)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
anova_model <- aov(bill_length_cm ~ species + sex, clean_penguins)
summary(anova_model)
TukeyHSD(anova_model)
```

```{r}
clean_penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(species, bill_length_cm, color = species, group = species)) +
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom() +
  theme_minimal() +
  stat_summary(color = "black") +
  guides(color = FALSE)
```


```{r}
clean_penguins |>
  count(species, sex) |>
  drop_na()
```
